My daughter and I had a wonderful stay at Jaymi’s Airbnb. We loved it. The location is just perfect.
Fantastic stay!! Jaymi is a wonderful and responsive host, and this space was so comfortable for a long term stay. Will definitely book again.
Gorgeous and clean, updated kitchen, convenient location in a sweet neighborhood. Will absolutely stay here again. Very charming location & great host.
Excellent location—close to the plaza and UMKC campus. Very clean and comfortable.
Fantastic place and host! So comfortable and great location. Highly recommend.
Jaymi responds extremely quickly and has created a quaint and comfortable apartment. We appreciated the modern appliances and ready-to-use kitchen.
Jaymi has created a beautiful space and it is perfectly located near everything you could want to do. Jaymi communicated very well and I would definitely stay again!
Amazing!  We had a great extended stay. The apartment had everything we needed and the location can’t be beat.
Nice place to stay for relaxation.

Wonderful stay!! The place was very neatly decorated and a lot of thought went into making this place a comfortable stay! We were able to work from home and has great internet speed.
